entry.source: The divide between the Luxurors and the{F801}Casualries has been done away with, but{F801}ever since the new rulers have taken power,{F801}my uneasiness just continues to grow...{F801}I'd like you to bring some guns to Kiccigiorgi{F801}Forest. If possible, we want to get a cannon{F801}known as a {F804,5}bazooka.{F804,0} Perhaps a military base...{F801}
